name: Game Story Nightmare Runners - Runners Part One
name_original: Game Story Nightmare Runners - Runners Part One
description:
Game Story Nightmare Runners - Runners Part One! Runners game story part one: i was with my friends playing and messing around in the forest when i enter a dark and strange place, soon i remember that i have no friends because of my strange dreams, and now where did i end up? to be continued... IF YOU ARE SMART, YOU CAN FINISH THE GAME IN 1 MINUTE IF YOU DON'T HAVE 5 MINUTES :) História do jogo Runners parte um: eu estava com meus amigos brincando e zoando na floresta quando eu entro em um lugar escuro e estranho, logo me lembro que nao tenho amigos por causa dos meus sonhos estranhos, e agora onde eu vim parar? continua... More information! Mais iformaçoes!

https://www.youtube.com/@SrCarlos_

Instagram @ups_carlus
